algorithms: Particle Swarm Optimization - Linear Discriminant Analysis (PSOLDA)
Fuzzy Learning based on Genetic Programming (GFS-GP)
Fuzzy Learning based on Genetic Programming Grammar Operators and Simulated Annealing (GFS-SP)
Structural Learning Algorithm in a Vague Environment with Feature Selection (SLAVE)
ml_techniques.novel_approaches: Hybridized search based algorithms combining advantages of SBAs and non-SBAs, such as PSOLDA, GFS-AB, GFS-LB, GFS-MaxLB, NNEP, HIDER, GFS-GP, GFS-SP, and SLAVE.
